spec_data.Name: rubygem-rainbow
spec_data.Description:
Rainbow is an extension to the Ruby String class adding support for colorizing
text on ANSI terminals.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:17:27 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Ruby String class extension enabling coloring text on ANSI terminals
